text: geunyeodeul-i jeonghayeojin gigan-eul chae woss-eul ttae jeongdanghi jaegyeolhab-eul hadeonji animyeon jeongdanghi hyeeojidoe neohui jung e geonjeonhan dumyeong-ui namja jeung-in-eul bulleo hananim-eul wihae jeung-eonhala geu leoham-i hananimgwa naeseleul midneun ja ege jueojin gyohun-ila hananim-eul dulyeowo han jaleul wihae hananim-eun hang sang hanaui gil-eul junbihasinila
